channel.title: Vs Code on IT Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Vs Code on IT Blog

item.title: VS Code
item.description: VS Code Extensions Python Docker Go EditorConfig for VS Code Sass Django Hotkeys Basic editing [Alt + ↑/↓] - Move line up/down [Ctrl + Shift + K] - Delete line [Ctrl + Shift + \] - Jump to the matching bracket [Ctrl + ]/[] - Indent/outdent line [Ctrl + /] - Toggle line comment Navigation [Ctrl + P] - Go to file [Ctrl + G] - Go to line [Ctrl + Shift + O] - Go to Symbol Search and replace [Ctrl + D] - Add selection to next Find match [Ctrl + F] - Find [Ctrl + H] - Replace [Alt + Enter] - Select all occurences of Find match [Ctrl + K Ctrl + D] - Move last selection to next Find match [Alt + C/R/W] - Toggle case-sensitive / regex / whole word [F3 / Shift + F3] - Find next/previous Rich languages editing [F12] - Go to Definition [F2] - Rename Symbol Multi-cursor and selection [Alt + Click] - Insert cursor [Shift + Alt + I] - Insert cursor at end of each line selected [Ctrl + Shift + L] - Select all occurrences of current selection [Shift + Alt + (drag mouse)] - Column (box) selection Display [Ctrl + Shift + F] - Show Search [Ctrl + Shift + E] - Show Explorer / Toggle focus [Ctrl + B] - Toggle Sidebar visibility
